hadiths.text: It was narrated from Uqbah bin Amir Al-Juhani that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever meets Allah (SWT) not associating anything in worship with him, and not having shed any blood unlawfully, will enter Paradise.”

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِي قَتْلِ مُسْلِمٍ ظُلْمًا
chapter.eng-name: The Severity Of Killing A Muslim
